about_the_game:
Original Soundtrack to Immortal: Unchained. Composed by Linus Söderlund.

Files can be located where Immortal: Unchained is installed. (Standard path: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\immortal\Immortal Album)

* Format: MP3
* Length: 01h 29m 56s
* Size: 164 MB (including album art)
* 44100 Hz sample rate
* 256 kpbs bitrate
* Stereo


  • 1. Tale from the Past

  • 2. Hidden Vaults

  • 3. Unchained and Unleashed

  • 4. Ascension to the Stars

  • 5. The Monolith

  • 6. Gates and Portals

  • 7. Arden

  • 8. The Records

  • 9. Ashborne Caverns

  • 10. Veridian

  • 11. The Vigil

  • 12. Apexion

  • 13. The Augur

  • 14. Undead Invaders

  • 15. Apex Citadel

  • 16. Outlook Promenade

  • 17. Seat of the Senate

  • 18. Heart of Anger

  • 19. Cinderwoods

  • 20. Molten Crag

  • 21. Fiery Depths

  • 22. Hidden Path

  • 23. Bilegrove

  • 24. Heart of Fear

  • 25. Charnels

  • 26. The Forgotten

  • 27. The Abyss

  • 28. The Cauldrons

  • 29. Heart of Grief

  • 30. Remnant of the Past

  • 31. Friend or Foe

  • 32. Void

  • 33. The Guide

  • 34. Deviation

  • 35. Immortal Unchained

  • 36. Passing Time

Files can be located where Immortal: Unchained is installed. (Standard path: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\immortal\Immortal Album)
